POST.POST_TITLE: Does sitting all day can change your bowel habits?

POST.POST_BODY: Does sitting all day can change your bowel habits? i am suffering from IBS / indigestion  , also when i pee, ants will go on my pee, bubbles when i urine. but on Blood Glucose Monitoring System test, it says it's on normal level

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY:
Hi, 
Sorry for the late reply.  Yes, being inactive can impact on your bowel habits and create constipation.  So can pregnancy.  So it could be a combination of the two. 

Have you had a urinalysis done?  That may be a good step, to check for protein and / or glucose. 

When you say levels of glucose are normal, what are the actual readings? .
